categories.name: Aesthetics Research
categories.description: Visual analysis of luxury fashion brands and editorial photography styles

documents.title: French Luxury Aesthetics
documents.summary: Deep dive into French luxury brands: Chanel, Saint Laurent, Dior, Herm√®s, Celine. Analyzes lighting techniques (Rembrandt, high-contrast B&W), composition, color palettes, and mood across 2020-2024 photography campaigns.

documents.title: Italian Luxury Aesthetics
documents.summary: Comprehensive analysis of Italian luxury: Prada, Gucci, Bottega Veneta, Valentino. Documents signature colors, photographer collaborations, and style evolution.

documents.title: Avant-Garde Aesthetics
documents.summary: Exploration of dark, experimental aesthetics: Maison Margiela, Comme des Gar√ßons, Yohji Yamamoto, Rick Owens. Theatrical, brutalist, and moody photography techniques.

documents.title: Luxury Minimalist Aesthetics
documents.summary: Quiet luxury and minimalism: Bottega Veneta, Jil Sander, Lemaire, The Row. Documentary realism, architectural precision, and understated elegance.

documents.title: Beauty & Skincare Aesthetics
documents.summary: Five distinct skin rendering philosophies: Glossier (dewy), Charlotte Tilbury (glowy), Fenty Beauty (authentic), La Mer (luminous), Aesop (natural). Macro beauty specifications and lighting techniques.

documents.title: Additional Luxury Brands
documents.summary: Extended brand analysis for future expansion covering additional luxury houses and contemporary designers.

categories.name: System & Methodology
categories.description: Technical frameworks and guides for prompt engineering and generation systems

documents.title: Prompt Building Guide
documents.summary: Core 9-component editorial prompt architecture: shot type, subject description, body framing, background, lighting, color grading, expression, styling, and technical specs.

documents.title: Variation Strategy Guide
documents.summary: Multi-dimensional variation system across 6 dimensions: environment, lighting, shot type, pose, camera, and mood. Blueprint for 20-prompt structure with 5 lighting/mood categories.

documents.title: Variable Prompt System
documents.summary: Component-based system for maximum composition variety: 26+ poses, 18+ backgrounds, 22+ lighting setups, 9 camera/lens combinations, 30+ clothing colors.

documents.title: Editorial Minimal System
documents.summary: Ultra-clean editorial photography system with 15+ fashion poses and super minimal background rules for high-end editorial aesthetic.

documents.title: Brand Renaming Strategy
documents.summary: Generic aesthetic profiles to avoid brand/logo generation: 7 aesthetic profile remappings (The Row ‚Üí Quiet Luxury, Rick Owens ‚Üí Dark Avant-Garde, etc.).

documents.title: Final Updates Summary
documents.summary: Implementation tracking and change records documenting system updates and improvements.

categories.name: Location Planning
categories.description: Strategic approaches to location assignment and environmental variety

documents.title: Location Mapping System
documents.summary: Similar-but-different location assignment strategy ensuring variety while maintaining cohesion across editorial shoots.

documents.title: Current Location Comparison
documents.summary: Analysis of location variation across models, documenting distribution and ensuring diverse environmental representation.

categories.name: Talent & Casting
categories.description: Model profiles, casting standards, and talent management

documents.title: Talent Roster
documents.summary: Comprehensive profiles of 25 diverse talent models with detailed specifications: gender, age, ethnicity, Fitzpatrick skin tone, physical descriptions, and aesthetic categories.

documents.title: New Models Summary
documents.summary: Recent model additions: Kai Thompson, Riley Morgan, Jordan Lee profiles with full casting details.

categories.name: Social Media Strategy
categories.description: Instagram strategy, content planning, PR angles, and social media best practices for fashion tech

documents.title: Instagram Grid Aesthetics for Creative Portfolios
documents.summary: Visual cohesion strategies, grid design principles (3x3, 6x6, 9x9), carousel vs single post strategies, fashion editorial grid case studies, and tools for maintaining aesthetic consistency.

documents.title: Content Calendar & Posting Strategy
documents.summary: Optimal posting times for fashion/creative audiences, posting frequency recommendations, content pillars structure, weekly/monthly planning frameworks, seasonal strategies, and batch creation systems.

documents.title: PR Strategy & Media Angles for Fashion Tech
documents.summary: Positioning strategies for fashion tech innovation, press kit creation, pitch angles for fashion publications (Vogue, WWD, BoF), AI ethics storytelling, founder story development, and journalist relationship building.

documents.title: Caption Writing & Storytelling for Fashion Tech
documents.summary: 30+ hook formulas, technical vs visual storytelling balance, hashtag research strategies, 50+ CTA examples, educational content formatting, behind-the-scenes frameworks, and voice/tone development.
